properties.name: jwt-key
properties.description: The key used for JWT encryption

properties.name: storage-account-name
properties.description: The storage account name for azure

properties.name: storage-account-key
properties.description: The key for the storage account, this can be obtained by going to the storage account then Access keys.

properties.name: max-size-per-user
properties.description: The maximum container size for each user

properties.name: max-file-size
properties.description: The maximum file size per file
